Tri-Level Living
In the heart of Coburg this modern triple story townhouse resides in a historic setting of the secluded Pentridge Village. Perfectly positioned a stones throw away from the cosmopolitan vibe of Sydney Rds endless shops, bars and restaurants.

Family friendly playground, park and community bbq in Coburg lake.
Shopping Center with cinema and community garden under construction. 15 mins to the Melbourne Airport. Close proximity to Coburg and Batman farmers markets. 10 mins drive to northland. 1 min walk to the famous Glass Den cafe!

• European laundry
• Fresh carpet and paint throughout
Excitingly close to Sydney Road's vibrant cafes and continental shops, Coburg's artisan markets, scenic Coburg Lake, cycle paths, schools and public transport.
